## Risk level

- [ ] Low  - cosmetic or docs
- [ ] Medium - some logic changes

## Rollback plan

- If merged: use GitHub "Revert" on this PR, or `git revert <SHA>`.
- Alternatively, in Vercel, promote a previous successful deployment.
- See `docs/ROLLBACK.md` for details.
